name: Wobble Ball
description:
Wobble ball is a fun and interesting game, there are 50 levels to play just by moving the ball in the correct hole by tilting your device. If you loved Labyrinth as a kid this is the next stage of gaming for you. 

Features:
- 50 levels.
- Level Difficulty
- Animations
- Autosaving. 
- Sound. 
- Tactile feedback. 
- Many more...

Privacy Policy: http://www.sickpumpkin.com/privacy/
